1.content:

And now you're going to hop into bed after a long day.

You push open the door to your bedroom and take a flying leap into your beloved bed. You don't bother to take off any of your clothes because when you're taking a trip from the Sleepytime junction all the way to Dreamland, you don't need clothes.
A haze fills your mind and your eyes begin to close. Little did you know, when they opened again, you would be in a completely different place.

As you slept, all of your best memories flew through your head. You notice that they are all memories of your favorite...

15112221.content:
Luke is your friend and he leaves a voicemail on your phone with a very excited tone.

"Dude you gotta come over now. Alex used her lab at college and invented this uhh, mass alternating capabl-.. something. I am calling it a shrink powder. Come now!"

You rush over, wanting to know more about it. Leave it to Alex to come up with something crazy like that. Now the three of you could try it out because there was nothing like reckless experimentation to kick off the summer. When you arrive at the Dunphy household however, you don't see most of the cars on the driveway. You leave your phone in the car and the door looks open, so you walk up to it oblivious that Luke left another voicemail shortly after: too dangerous.. don't go in the house.. we're flushing the powder..

"Hello? Anyone home? Luke? Alex?" You go inside but no one answers back. Your hand feels odd so you look at it and see that when you grabbed the door knob, you smeared it with a white residue. "Help! I think I touched it...!"
Uh oh... You feel faint and everything else happens so fast. Whoosh!

When you come to, you're back at the entrance of the Dunphy household - except this time it looks like the castle of a giant family. Your cries for help are squeaks at this point and no one would be able to hear it anyway. You'll need their help when they come back, good thing they all left... BOOM! BOOM!

Coming down the stairs and realizing the door to the front is wide open, an equally oblivious Haley walks down barefoot with headphones on. No wonder she couldn't hear anything.
"Haley help! I am down here!" A giant foot whizzes over you and stomps the floor in front. Holy crap, almost killed me.

"HEY WHO LEFT THE DOOR OPEN?" Haley's voice booms. "ARE YOU GUYS BACK YET?"

You look at your friend's eldest sister, she's an attractive mid-twenties girl and you've always had a huge crush on her. Can't believe she's still in pajamas and almost crushed you, now you might have to rely on her for help.

Her other barefoot lands with a thundering crash. She looks around and shrugs, getting ready to go back upstairs to the sanctity of her room. What do?

info.brief_description: You've been shrunken and placed in the house of fictional characters.
info.description:
The plot is simple: You are tiny and inside the habitat of your favorite video game/TV characters. The catch is that they don't know you're there and will not notice if they step on you, sit on you,etc.

Here are some guidelines:
1. Male and female interaction is allowed, though I will only be doing male.

2. Try not to kill the character too quickly and if you do, don't make it gorey.

3. I'm pretty much okay with everything, except for unbirth.

4. If I edit your chapter, it's probably either because of grammar issues or simply something I didn't want to see. Please don't be offended.

I will be awarding gift points for good adds

Other than that, GO WILD!!
